title: Check Out Immortals Fenyx Rising's First Boss Fight
summary:
If you hadn't noticed by now, Greek mythology is in.
Whether it's taking down the Hydra in Hades, or sailing the Mediterranean in Assassin's Creed Odessey, the mythological tales of Zeus and his cohorts seems ripe for exploration.
Immortals Fenyx Rising continues that trend but with a slightly different twist.
Join us as we take you through one of the game's early vaults and show off the first boss fight during our time seeing the opening hours of Immortals Fenyx Rising!
If you enjoyed this look in the game, be sure to check out our in-depth preview of Immortals Fenyx Rising's combat, puzzles, and humor, along with our discussion about Ubisoft's new IP during an episode of The GI Show.

Immortals Fenyx Rising continues that trend but with a slightly different twist. Pulling inspiration from titles such as The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild and the aforementioned adventures of Kassandra and Alexios, Ubisoft's new IP sets out to take a more humorous and fun approach to one of the world's most iconic mythologies.
